solution_line_template: The sum of the weights of the three adults is {avg_adult_weight} x {num_adults} = <<{avg_adult_weight}*{num_adults}={total_adult_weight}>>{total_adult_weight} pounds.
The sum of the weight of the two children is {avg_child_weight} x {num_children} = <<{avg_child_weight}*{num_children}={total_child_weight}>>{total_child_weight} pounds.
So the total weight of the 5 people who are in the elevator is {total_adult_weight} + {total_child_weight} = <<{total_adult_weight}+{total_child_weight}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} pounds.

This would mean that the next person's weight must not exceed {max_elevator_weight} - {total_weight} = <<{max_elevator_weight}-{total_weight}={max_next_person_weight}>>{max_next_person_weight} pounds.
